segments.speaker: speaker1
segments.text: Hi, I'm Cooksy. And I'm Paul.

segments.speaker: speaker1
segments.text: We've started something really exciting and we want you to be the first to know about it. It's all about creativity, innovation, and helping creators to do their best work faster, better, and easier.

segments.speaker: speaker1
segments.text: Introducing Nice Touch. We're calling it the operating system for creators.

segments.speaker: speaker1
segments.text: but a smart intuitive set of tools

segments.speaker: speaker1
segments.text: that streamline your existing creative processes.

segments.speaker: speaker1
segments.text: This means smoother workflows, fewer disruptions, more opportunities to create amazing work

segments.speaker: speaker1
segments.text: leading to better projects, more gigs and more income for creators.

segments.speaker: speaker1
segments.text: This is just the beginning. Who knows where we'll end up, but it's going to be big.
